title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7910.1 - Purpose and scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7910.1 - Purpose and scope

State Regulations

This Part establishes the rules governing the Energy

Investment Loan Program. The program provides interest subsidies and loan
guarantees on loans written by financing institutions for eligible energy
conservation improvements. The sectors served by the program are commercial and
industrial businesses, pursuant to Energy Law, section 5-127, and multifamily
housing buildings and agri-businesses, pursuant to chapter 645 of the Laws of
1986. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7910.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
